00012 #include "DMUAccelerometer.h"
00013 #include <iostream>
00014 using namespace std;
00015 
00016 DMUAccelerometer::DMUAccelerometer(const cfgBody& cfgdat) 
00017 {
00018         const char *myCommands[20] = {"ChannelID", "Mode", "Offset", "ScaleFactor"};
00019         int i;
00020         for (i = 0; cfgdat.keys[i][0]; i++) {
00021                 
00022                 switch(getCmdIndex(myCommands, cfgdat.keys[i])) {
00023                         case 0:
00024                                 m_channelID = atoi(cfgdat.vals[i][0]);
00025                                 break;
00026                         case 1:
00027                                 m_mode = atoi(cfgdat.vals[i][0]);
00028                                 break;
00029                         case 2:
00030                                 m_offset = atof(cfgdat.vals[i][0]);
00031                                 break;
00032                         case 3:
00033                                 m_accelScaleFactor = atof(cfgdat.vals[i][0]);
00034                                 break;
00035                         default:
00036                                 cout << " bad info in DMUAccelerometer config section! " << endl;
00037                                 break;
00038                 };              
00039         };
00040         
00041         if (DMUAccelerometer::Initialize() != 0)
00042         {
00043                 cout << " error, DMUAccelerometer::Initialize() is not happy " << endl;
00044         }
00045 };
